Text: PJM Capacity CreditsNonPrivilegedpst Hi Elizabeth How are you Things are fine here except very busy I am ready for the weekend I am going to Mississippi to see my family and relax I just wanted to pass on our new definition of PJM Capacity Credits which Dede worked on with our PJM marketer I got a another definition from Exelon who said that they had stolen it from Enron Dede seems to think this one is better and more current so here it is See attached file Capacity Credit Definition doc We are going to start adding it as a definition under the EEI with counterparties with whom we trade this product S Capacity Credit Definition doc

FINAL VERSION OF CALL OPTION CONFIRMATIONNonPrivilegedpst In case either of you would like to have a copy See attached file Enron ERCOT Call Option doc Thanks to both of you for your help Sincerely Shari Enron ERCOT Call Option doc

Short Form WSPP Collateral Annex Cc Attached please find the short form collateral support annex to the WSPP Agreement which we are planning to propose at the WSPP Collateral Annex meeting Please let me know if you have any comments Thanks Shari Reliant Resources Inc Louisiana Ste Houston TX Tel Fax Email The preceding email message contains information that is confidential may be protected by the attorneyclient or other applicable privileges and may constitute nonpublic information It is intended to be conveyed only to the designated recipients If you are not an intended recipient of this message please do not read copy or disclose the contents of this communication to others and please notify the sender at If you are not the intended recipient we would appreciate your forwarding the message back to us and deleting it from your systemUnauthorized use dissemination distribution or reproduction of this message is strictly prohibited and may be unlawful Thank you See attached file WSPP Collateral Amendment doc WSPP Collateral Amendment doc

Re Collateral Annex Cc Hi Carol It was good to hear from you I have heard that they are keeping you pretty busy over there with Broadband and Power With regard to Reliants comments MidCalculation language Our commentthought on this was made because we did not recall that this concept was ever approved by the Working Group Current MarktoMarket Value I withdraw my comment I have thought about it further and it is not relevant here LC Evergreen language I guess I would say that most of the time the form LC we send to counterparties has this language in since it makes sense if the parties are going to have an ongoing trading relationship I think that the Enron form has evergreen language too It is more of an administrative hassle if it is not there but I dont have a strong feeling either way since we can just keep using our own form I dont recall the discussion on this point and thus dont know if it was one person objecting or several I hope this answers the questions Thanks for doing all this work Sincerely Shari Senior Counsel Reliant Resources Inc Louisiana Ste Houston TX Tel Fax Email The preceding email message contains information that is confidential may be protected by the attorneyclient or other applicable privileges and may constitute nonpublic information It is intended to be conveyed only to the designated recipients If you are not an intended recipient of this message please do not read copy or disclose the contents of this communication to others and please notify the sender at If you are not the intended recipient we would appreciate your forwarding the message back to us and deleting it from your systemUnauthorized use dissemination distribution or reproduction of this message is strictly prohibited and may be unlawful Thank you St Clair Carol To CarolStClair cc Sager Elizabeth enroncom Subject Collateral Annex AM Shari Hope all is well with you I agree with all of your comments On Current MarktoMarket Value why did you delete the mid calculation language Also I am not sure that understood your question about a partys credit rating On the LC I took out the evergreen language in response to a comment from someone I need to put in at least expiration date language Do you feel strongly about having evergreen language Carol St Clair EB phone fax cell phone pager home fax This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

EEI Collateral Annex and Cover Sheet Cc Elizabeth Here are the comments from me and Dede I have given it to our Credit Dept and asked for comments but I doubt they will have much to add Call me if you have any questions with what we wrote With regard to the fullblown WSPP Collateral Annex Dede and I think it would be better to get the EEI one in a final form before converting it over to fit into the WSPP Otherwise we could be revising the documents in parallel I am planning to get the short draft WSPP Collateral Annex over to you today Thanks Shari See attached file Collateral Annex Revised REDdoc See attached file Collateral Annex Cover Sheet REDdoc Collateral Annex Revised REDdoc Collateral Annex Cover Sheet REDdoc

WSPP MeetingHe is one of us you will love this memo Forwarded by Shari StackADMHouInd on PM Jeremy D Weinstein jeremy acif To icorpcom cc Subject PM Please respond to Jeremy D Weinstein See attached file WSPPMEMDOC WSPPMEMDOC
